title: Configure Advanced Settings for DigitalOcean Managed Databases
description: Use this tool to customize your DigitalOcean managed database configuration and generate the corresponding API request.

title: DigitalOcean Firewall Manager
description: Generate the API command to create and delete advanced firewall rules, including deny rules.

title: DigitalOcean GenAI Platform Pricing Calculator
description: Calculate your estimated costs for building GPU-powered AI agents with fully-managed deployment.

title: DigitalOcean Spaces Presigned URL Helper
description: This tool generates pre-signed URLs for secure, temporary access to objects in your DigitalOcean Spaces Bucket. Pre-signed URLs are useful for allowing time-limited uploads and downloads without requiring users to have DigitalOcean credentials.
